text:
Abiy Ahmed Ali (; born 15 August 1976) is an Ethiopian politician. He was appointed as 12th Prime Minister of Ethiopia on 2 April 2018. He is chairman of both the ruling EPRDF (Ethiopian Peoples’ Revolutionary Democratic Front) and the OPDO (Oromo Peoples' Democratic Organization).
Ahmed was awarded the 2019 Nobel Peace Prize for his efforts to end border conflict between Ethiopia and Eritrea.
